title: rahulzx
author: rahulzx
content: Share your usual weekend planning and do you care about how much cash you spend for your entertainment?

comments.author: Dariona
comments.body: I live according to the plan. Yes, there are force majeure events, but in general there is a plan. Money is a resource, so it should be used wisely.

comments.author: Longholder
comments.created_time: February 25, 2023, 07:35:11 PMLast edit: February 26, 2023, 06:53:19 PM by Longholder
comments.body: As it is still very cold and windy outside I mostly stay inside my flat and play online casino (a crypto casino that I got from cryptogmblr.com), sometimes watch Youtube videos or grind twitter. Oh and from time to time I go to the gym.

comments.author: I_RodimusPrime
comments.body: Mostly by watching movies/tv series with lot of foods and drinks.

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: weekends are great moments to relax i sleep a lot and go outside in bars,pubs to drink i spend arround 100$

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: It varies from week to week but you can usually guarantee that alcohol is involved most of the time. After a long week I like to unwind & have fun with friends. I usually like sports betting too, I have a particular interest in American Football. I like eating out too, sometimes I just like to be lazy around the house, watching movies & eating crap.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: mostly Out of town with my family , because that is the only time I can give them my complete time.Imagine them having me  not for the whole week as A spend my time at work and when in home spend my time in front of computer .so the weekend must be for them Unless i have emergency or something more important for their benefits.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: usually on the weekend I go out with my girlfriend to eat pizza and play with friends on the playstation

comments.author: Mr__ZACK
comments.body: It's been said that plans can't keep up with change. Most of the time, no matter what you set out to do, you fail to accomplish it. But if you don't make plans, you won't know what to do or what you need to do.I spend the majority of the  weekend at home with my family, watching movies, and occasionally making outings to see friends and relatives .

comments.author: Lafarekh
comments.body: I just sleep and watch movies and sometimes order food.

comments.author: s1mple98
comments.body: I try to go for a walk alone, at least a couple of hours to get my mind off things, and sometimes I go out with friends.

comments.author: Ronaelen
comments.body: I usually spend my weekends visiting, for free

comments.author: mich
comments.body: After a hard week of work, I cannot wait to clock out of my job and enjoy my weekends. I enjoy camping with my friends because it is a great time to spend your day and when we are done we like to prepare a BBQ. The best part of my weekends with my friends is being able to catch up around the warm bonfire and be with the nature. I set up our tent which fits about 4 people and is just perfect for myself and my friends.We have enough space to set up our inflatable twin beds, and have a sleeping bag, blanket, and can’t forget about a small pillow. We use a cooler with ice to store away our soda, water, meat, eggs, some vegetables, and fruits. Aside from food, if you bring a small grill, charcoal, lighter fluid, lighter, knife, forks, and knife is pretty much all you need for an exciting weekend.
